statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click'
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE price > 100)
DELETE FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 100 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE product_id = 500 AND recommendation_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommendation_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 AND score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'purchase' AND action_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
DELETE FROM user_events WHERE user_id = 123 AND event_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM recommended_products WHERE user_id = 456 AND recommendation_score < 3.5;
